survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Plant Care Subscription Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who subscribe to plant care services to evaluate their satisfaction and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the plants received through your subscription?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure the options are balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the plants received through your subscription?

questions.question_text: Which of the following plant care services do you use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select question to identify popular services.

script.question_text: Which of the following plant care services do you use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the plant care subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the plant care subscription service?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this plant care subscription service to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood of recommendation.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this plant care subscription service to others?
